languages.text: {n}В канале на несколько секунд повисает пауза.{/n} "В таком случае... охрана палуб от теней не представляется возможной. Мы усилим наряды в ключевых точках корабля и будем рассчитывать на то, что инцидент больше не повторится".

traits.locale_text: {n}В канале на несколько секунд повисает пауза.{/n} "В таком случае... охрана палуб от теней не представляется возможной. Мы усилим наряды в ключевых точках корабля и будем рассчитывать на то, что инцидент больше не повторится".

languages.text: {n}A pregnant pause fills the vox-channel.{/n} "In that case... guarding the decks against every shadow will not be possible. We will strengthen the security detail at key points on the vessel and hope the incident does not happen again."
languages.original_text: {n}В канале на несколько секунд повисает пауза.{/n} "В таком случае... охрана палуб от теней не представляется возможной. Мы усилим наряды в ключевых точках корабля и будем рассчитывать на то, что инцидент больше не повторится".

traits.locale_text: {n}A pregnant pause fills the vox-channel.{/n} "In this case... Guarding the decks from shadows will not be possible. We will strengthen the security detail at key points on the vessel and hope the incident does not happen again."

{n}A pregnant pause fills the vox-channel.{/n} "In this case... Guarding the decks from shadows will not be possible. We will strengthen the security detail at key points on the vessel and hope the incident does not happen again."

{n}A pregnant pause fills the vox-channel.{/n} "In that case... guarding the decks against every shadow will not be possible. We will strengthen the security detail at key points on the vessel and hope the incident does not happen again."

{n}A pregnant pause fills the vox-channel.{/n} "In that case... guarding the decks against every shadow will not be possible. We will strengthen the security detail at key points on the vessel and hope the incident does not happen again."

{n}A pregnant pause fills the vox-channel.{/n} "In that case... guarding the decks against every shadow will not be possible. We will strengthen the security detail at key points on the vessel and hope the incident does not happen again."

languages.text: {n}Eine bedeutungsschwangere Pause füllt den Vox-Kanal.{/n} "Wenn das so ist ... wir können die Decks unmöglich gegen jeden Schatten verteidigen. Wir verstärken die Sicherheitsteams an wichtigen Punkten auf dem Schiff und hoffen, dass es nicht wieder zu einem solchen Zwischenfall kommt."
languages.original_text: {n}A pregnant pause fills the vox-channel.{/n} "In that case... guarding the decks against every shadow will not be possible. We will strengthen the security detail at key points on the vessel and hope the incident does not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine bedeutungsschwangere Pause füllt den Vox-Kanal.{/n} "Wenn das so ist ... wir können die Decks unmöglich gegen jeden Schatten verteidigen. Wir verstärken die Sicherheitsteams an wichtigen Punkten auf dem Schiff und hoffen, dass es nicht wieder zu einem solchen Zwischenfall kommt."

languages.text: {n}音阵频道出现了意味深长的停顿。{/n}“如果是这种情况……想要确保甲板没有任何阴影区域，恐怕是无法实现的事情。我们会加强船上关键地点的安保工作，希望此类事件不会再次发生。”
languages.original_text: {n}A pregnant pause fills the vox-channel.{/n} "In that case... guarding the decks against every shadow will not be possible. We will strengthen the security detail at key points on the vessel and hope the incident does not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵频道出现了意味深长的停顿。{/n}“如果是这种情况……想要确保甲板没有任何阴影区域，恐怕是无法实现的事情。我们会加强船上关键地点的安保工作，希望此类事件不会再次发生。”

languages.text: {n}Le canal vox s'interrompt un instant.{/n} « Dans ce cas... faire disparaître toutes les ombres des ponts sera impossible. Nous renforcerons la sécurité aux points clés du navire en espérant que l'incident ne se reproduira pas. »
languages.original_text: {n}A pregnant pause fills the vox-channel.{/n} "In that case... guarding the decks against every shadow will not be possible. We will strengthen the security detail at key points on the vessel and hope the incident does not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le canal vox s'interrompt un instant.{/n} « Dans ce cas... faire disparaître toutes les ombres des ponts sera impossible. Nous renforcerons la sécurité aux points clés du navire en espérant que l'incident ne se reproduira pas. »

languages.text: {n}Una pausa cargada llena el canal de voco.{/n} «En ese caso... proteger las cubiertas contra todas las sombras es imposible. Tendremos que reforzar la seguridad en las zonas esenciales de la nave y espera que no se repita el incidente».
languages.original_text: {n}A pregnant pause fills the vox-channel.{/n} "In that case... guarding the decks against every shadow will not be possible. We will strengthen the security detail at key points on the vessel and hope the incident does not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una pausa cargada llena el canal de voco.{/n} «En ese caso... proteger las cubiertas contra todas las sombras es imposible. Tendremos que reforzar la seguridad en las zonas esenciales de la nave y espera que no se repita el incidente».

languages.text: {n}意味深な沈黙がヴォクス通信から流れる。{/n}「その場合…全ての影からデッキを守ることは不可能です。船の主要ポイントの守備を強化し、同じことが起こらないよう祈りましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}A pregnant pause fills the vox-channel.{/n} "In that case... guarding the decks against every shadow will not be possible. We will strengthen the security detail at key points on the vessel and hope the incident does not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}意味深な沈黙がヴォクス通信から流れる。{/n}「その場合…全ての影からデッキを守ることは不可能です。船の主要ポイントの守備を強化し、同じことが起こらないよう祈りましょう」

languages.text: {n}Voks kanalında anlamlı bir sessizlik oluşuyor.{/n} "Bu durumda... Güverteleri bütün gölgelere karşı korumaya almak mümkün olmayacak. Güvenlik ekiplerini geminin kilit noktalarına yoğunlaştıracak ve bir daha böyle bir olay yaşanmamasını umacağız."
languages.original_text: {n}A pregnant pause fills the vox-channel.{/n} "In that case... guarding the decks against every shadow will not be possible. We will strengthen the security detail at key points on the vessel and hope the incident does not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Voks kanalını anlamlı bir sessizlik dolduruyor.{/n} "Bu durumda... Güverteleri bütün gölgelere karşı korumaya almak mümkün olmayacak. Güvenlik ekiplerini geminin kilit noktalarına yoğunlaştıracağız ve bir daha böyle bir olay yaşanmamasını umacağız."
